prompt.focus: Make sure the photodiode is aligned and the EEG recording has begun before continuing.
prompt.fullscreen: Press 'cmd + ctrl + F' to toggle Fullscreen.
prompt.zoom: Zoom in to enlarge the screen.

eventMarker.found: Hold the USB event marker in front of the camera.
eventMarker.not_found: Note: no USB event marker found.

instructions.start: Press start when you are ready to begin.
instructions.stop: Press stop when the task is over. Then stop all recordings.
